import React from 'react'; import './Activities.css'; const Activities = () => { const activities = [ { id: 1, title: 'Dune Bashing', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1506905925346-21bda4d32df4?w=400', description: 'Experience the thrill of driving through sand dunes' }, { id: 2, title: 'ATV Riding', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1519682337058-a94d519337bc?w=400', description: 'Ride through desert landscapes on powerful ATVs' }, { id: 3, title: 'Camel Riding', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1506905925346-21bda4d32df4?w=400', description: 'Traditional camel rides in the desert' }, { id: 4, title: 'Sandboarding', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1519682337058-a94d519337bc?w=400', description: 'Surf down sand dunes on a board' }, { id: 5, title: 'Desert Safari', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1506905925346-21bda4d32df4?w=400', description: 'Full day desert adventure experience' }, { id: 6, title: 'Sunset Tours', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1519682337058-a94d519337bc?w=400', description: 'Watch the sunset from the highest dunes' } ]; return (
